etymology.interpretation: The presence of the metal element suggests the nature of silver, while the phonetic component provides the pronunciation.
etymology.simplification: 金 is simplified to 钅 to reduce strokes, showcasing a standard practice in creating more efficient written forms.

examples.chinese: 我喜欢银色的项链(我喜歡銀色的項鍊)。
他收集了很多银币(他收集了很多銀幣)。
examples.english: He has collected many silver coins.
